edu.biu.scapi.primitives.universalHash

Class EvaluationHashFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.biu.scapi.primitives.universalHash.EvaluationHashFunction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UniversalHash

    public final class EvaluationHashFunction
extends java.lang.Object
implements UniversalHash
    Concrete class of perfect universal hash for evaluation hash function.
    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Meital Levy)

      • getInputSize

        public int getInputSize()
        Evaluation hash function can get any input size which is between 0 to 64t bits. while t = 2^24.
        Specified by:
        getInputSize in interface UniversalHash
        Returns:
        the upper bound of the input size - 64t

      • getOutputSize

        public int getOutputSize()
        Specified by:
        getOutputSize in interface UniversalHash
        Returns:
        the output size of evaluation hash function - 8 bytes.

        Computes the hash function on the in byte array and put the result in the output byte array
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        in - - input byte array
        inOffset - - the offset within the input byte array
